Package com.persistit.util

Interface Summary
Debug.Dbg  
SequencerConstants Constants used in the implementation of internal tests on concurrent behavior.
UtilControl  
 

Class Summary
ArgParser A simple command line argument parser that provides primitive type conversion and value checking.
Debug Internal helper methods used to help verify code correctness.
InternalHashSet A minimal HashSet-like collection that allows lookup by just hash code.
InternalHashSet.Entry  
ThreadSequencer Internal utility that allows tests to define execution sequences to confirm specific concurrent execution patterns.
ThreadSequencer.Condition  
Util
